Articles.Content: So I just started playing again recently and I noticed that Mechjeb was not working. The last time I played was before the 1.2, btw. I mainly used Mechjeb for the information panel (TWR Delta V remaining etc.). Is there an update to this mod I am not aware of, or is there another mod that can give me a real-time readout of these statistics?
The Dev builds for MechJeb work with 1.2.x. If you wish however only info, consider KER or VOID, both updated for 1.2.x as well. Probably other add-ons also fit your needs for specific set of data.
I highly recommend VOID, if all you need is great in-flight data display.
There is also Basic Orbit (scroll down).
